title: Project Echo – Developer Profile App
subtitle: CIS 376 final dev profile
description: JSON-driven portfolio that loads projects and achievements from data files, renders them as Bootstrap cards, and uses zero-md to display a knowledge reflection article.

title: Project Delta – DuckDuckGo UX Redesign
subtitle: CIS 376 UX / text-based interface improvement
description: Redesigned a cramped mobile-style search bar into a bubble interface where each search term can be added, edited, or removed quickly, while tracking click count and time to run a query.

title: Project Alpha – Static Portfolio Site
subtitle: Intro web dev project
description: A semantic HTML and CSS site focused on clean structure, accessibility, and GitHub Pages deployment. Practiced headings, semantic tags, and basic responsive design.

title: Project Bravo - Network+ Study App
subtitle: CompTIA Network+ study helper
description: A small JavaScript quiz app to drill Network+ topics like ports, protocols, and OSI layers. Tracks correct answers and gives instant feedback for each question.
